short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple todo list extension, with task editing, drag and drop features, calendar features, color theme customization

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your daily tasks with Quill.

Features:
1. Write down and keep track of tasks on a daily basis.
2. Set due dates of selected tasks as a reminder to stay focused.
3. Easy access to all of your tasks with a click of a button.

Update 2.0.2 Notes: 
- Improved UI and updated color theme.
- Added dark mode and light toggle
- Added new features such as due date tracking and drag and drop tasks for organization.
- Clean and easy to use interface.
- Added color theme customization.
